safari_ios.notes: The API exists, but the title not visible in the UI.

notes: Since Firefox 108, user interaction is no longer required to call this API when the extensions.openPopupWithoutUserGesture.enabled preference is set (bug 1799344).
Support for the windowId parameter was added in Firefox 108.

firefox.notes: Tab-specific badge background color is not cleared when a new page is loaded.

safari.notes: The API exists, but has no effect.

safari_ios.notes: The API exists, but has no effect.

__compat.description: The color property of the details parameter can be set to null.
The color property of the details parameter can be set to a string.

firefox.notes: Before Firefox 59, invalid color strings behaved as null.
Tab-specific badge text is not cleared when a new page is loaded.

__compat.description: The text property of the details parameter can be set to null.

chrome.notes: Before Chrome 23, path couldn't specify multiple icon files, but had to be a string specifying a single icon path.

firefox.notes: Tab-specific icons are not cleared when a new page is loaded.

__compat.description: The path and imageData properties of the details parameter can be set to null.

firefox.notes: Tab-specific popups are not cleared when a new page is loaded.

firefox_android.notes: Tab-specific popups are not cleared when a new page is loaded.

__compat.description: The popup property of the details parameter can be set to null.

firefox.notes: Tab-specific titles are not cleared when a new page is loaded.

firefox_android.notes: Tab-specific titles are not cleared when a new page is loaded.

safari_ios.notes: The API exists, but the title not visible in the UI.

__compat.description: The title property of the details parameter can be set to null.
